notes: Newly renovated apartment in excellent condition with modern fixtures including crystal chandelier, split AC, and sleek white kitchen with gas stovetop and built-in appliances. The building has a luxurious lobby with marble floors and concierge area, indicating a high-end residential complex. For baby safety, the unit has no visible stairs or balconies, smooth polished floors (can be slippery), and low floor-to-ceiling windows that may need childproofing; the unit comes unfurnished with good natural light.
